pages.text: There are several materials with heat-resistance capabilities, provided the relevant components are extracted from them; I will simply call this set of materials slag to make things easier for me. I came up with several sources: I can get it from soaking certain materials, like limestone in water or coal coke in wooden tar for a bigger yield; I can also bash or grind down shells and gems.
Whichever the case, adding a binding agent like clay to this slag and heating it in a kiln will make refractory bricks, useful to make a Refractory, a better Kiln and other useful items.
